metadata.name: Suspicious TCP Tunnel Via PowerShell Script
metadata.comment: Detects powershell scripts that creates sockets/listeners which could be indicative of tunneling activity

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('[system.net.httpwebrequest]')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('system.net.sockets.tcplistener')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('accepttcpclient')))

output.summary: Detects powershell scripts that creates sockets/listeners which could be indicative of tunneling activity
